video.title: Jericho
video.synopsis: Jake returns to his Kansas town to collect an inheritance, but a nuclear blast cuts off the outside world and makes him a reluctant leader amid chaos.

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a nuclear attack, Jake Green returns to his hometown of Jericho, Kan., after a mysterious five-year absence.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jake rallies Jericho residents to take shelter from fallout from the nuclear bomb that destroyed Denver. However, the shelter is uninhabitable.
episodes.title: Fallout

episodes.synopsis: Satellite news reports the extent of the nuclear catastrophe to the shell-shocked townspeople, and Stanley claims he saw tanks rolling into Denver.
episodes.title: Four Horsemen

episodes.synopsis: Despite the risk of contamination, Jake and Heather rescue a man disfigured by extensive radiation poisoning and bring him to the hospital.
episodes.title: Walls of Jericho

episodes.synopsis: Homeland Security phones Jericho with a recorded message promising help will arrive soon. Hopes rise when communication is restored and power returns.
episodes.title: Federal Response

episodes.synopsis: At precisely 9:02, an electromagnetic pulse shuts down power in Jericho, leaving the town in the dark. Farmers desperately try to save their crops.
Gray Anderson, shocked by the horrors he witnessed when traveling outside of Jericho, returns with information about which other cities were targeted.
episodes.title: Long Live the Mayor

episodes.synopsis: Mayor Green faces certain death if Jake and Eric fail to bring back medication in time. Meanwhile, Gray Anderson interrogates Rob Hawkins.
episodes.title: Rogue River

episodes.synopsis: The Ravenwood gang Jake and Eric encountered at Rogue River shows up in Jericho and takes resources by force.
episodes.title: Crossroads

episodes.synopsis: During Thanksgiving, the exhausted townspeople are simultaneously elated and wary when bombers fly overhead and drop parachutes holding supplies.
episodes.title: Red Flag

episodes.synopsis: Gray Anderson uses a murder investigation to boost his reputation among the townspeople, hoping it will help him win the mayoral election.
episodes.title: Vox Populi

episodes.synopsis: Flashbacks reveal that before the bombs struck, Jake failed to secure a job as a charter pilot because his file was flagged as suspicious.
episodes.title: The Day Before

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Johnston take a trip to the Black Jack trading post, looking for parts to repair Jericho's windmill.
episodes.title: Black Jack

episodes.synopsis: Strangers run Jake, Stanley and Mimi off the road while they are hunting, pinning Jake under the vehicle and knocking Stanley unconscious.
episodes.title: Heart of Winter

episodes.synopsis: Marines roll into Jericho in a tank and tell the townspeople that the war has ended, with the United States bombing Iran and North Korea.
episodes.title: Semper Fidelis

episodes.synopsis: Jake forces Kenchy to perform a risky operation on April as complications arise with her pregnancy. Meanwhile, Johnston searches frantically for Eric.
episodes.title: Winter's End

episodes.synopsis: With supplies dwindling, Mayor Gray Anderson decides to evict the refugees. Meanwhile, terrorists in New York are revealed to have used false FBI IDs.
episodes.title: One Man's Terrorist

episodes.synopsis: Horrified by the mounting evidence that Hawkins is a terrorist, Jake holds him at gunpoint and demands answers.
episodes.title: A.K.A

episodes.synopsis: Eric goes missing after assisting with the construction of wind turbines in the neighboring town of New Bern.
episodes.title: Casus Belli

episodes.synopsis: When townspeople from New Bern raid Jericho's salt mine, a gun battle results in several New Bern citizens being injured.
episodes.title: One if by Land

episodes.synopsis: New Bern threatens to take aggressive action against Jericho unless they hand over seven farms and half their salt mine.
episodes.title: Coalition of the Willing

episodes.synopsis: A border war explodes between Jericho and New Bern. Although New Bern outstrips Jericho in both men and resources, Jericho still has the tank.
episodes.title: Why We Fight

episodes.synopsis: During the aftermath of the confrontation between Jericho and New Bern, the Cheyenne government sends in Maj. Beck to determine what sparked the war.
episodes.title: Reconstruction

episodes.synopsis: The president sends a delegate to announce that he plans to deliver a speech from the Richmond Farm steps, and new sheriff Jake prepares the town.
episodes.title: Condor

episodes.synopsis: Dale returns to Jericho with the alarming news that the Hudson River Virus has breached the Mississippi.
episodes.title: Jennings & Rall

episodes.synopsis: Goetz flexes his authority as the citizens of Jericho chafe under the unfair pricing practices of Jennings & Rall, leading to tragic consequences.
episodes.title: Oversight

episodes.synopsis: An angry Jake orders the Rangers to safeguard Mimi by protecting the hospital where she's recovering from a shootout at the ranch.
episodes.title: Termination for Cause

episodes.synopsis: While the Cheyenne government's hold over Jericho unravels in the wake of the Rangers meting out rough justice, Maj. Beck tries to maintain order.
episodes.title: Sedition

episodes.synopsis: Jake and Hawkins have an opportunity to expose the conspiracy behind the September attacks. But first they'll have to get by the Cheyenne government.
episodes.title: Patriots and Tyrants
